project summary:

A passion site made for my squishmallow collection, and the first full website I made to practice my skills in CSS, HTML & JS

This website was made for me to practice applying my coding to a full site in my Web Design class. It is fully hand coded and includes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code, including interactive tables and other types of JS and responsive css. There are still many changes I plan to make to it, and it's being updated as I learn new skills.
